titleStmt.title: The beginning and progress of a needful and hopeful reformation in England with the first encounter of the enemy against it, his wiles detected, and his design ('t may be hop'd) defeated.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stephens (Socrates Christianus). Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library..
